attributes.action: Make social services accountable when they fail children who are being abused
attributes.additional_details: Too many children are being murdered by the hands of adults , in some cases social services have failed these children when family members have told them
attributes.background: Change the law when children are being abused and social services fail them , they also need to be made accountable like the abuser is

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about social services failing to prevent tragic outcomes, but we're not sure exactly what you want to happen when you say you want the Government to make social services "accountable".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
